DOC.brief_summary: This randomize , open-label , parallel-group study assess effect disease remission RoActemra/Actemra ( tocilizumab ) combination disease-modifying antirheumatic drug ( DMARDs ) versus current best practice non-biologic DMARD therapy patient moderate-to-severe active rheumatoid arthritis . Patients randomly assign RoActemra/Actemra treatment group receive 8 mg/kg RoActemra/Actemra intravenously every 4 week . The anticipated time study treatment 12 month .
